content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ have you ever wanted to learn to crochet a shawl with a pretty texture the picot crochet shawl uses two strands of yarn held together for some sections the hawthrone tonal hand painted yarn paired with the aloft hand painted mohair yarn creates a soft and cozy wrap **crochet hook ** 5 0 mm h furls hook 2 **notions ** removable stitch markers 3 yarn needle to weave in ends tassel maker 3 **yarn ** hawthorne tonal hand painted 4 in colorway sweet home color a - 2 hanks 357 yds/ 100 g fingering weight yarn aloft hand painted 5 in colorway rio color b - 2 balls 260 yds/ 25 g lace weight yarn **yardage ** fingering weight 665 yds 608 m lace weight mohair 420 yds 384 m **abbreviations/stitches ** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet space - space st s - stitch es treble_crochet- treble_crochet repeat - repeat rs - right side ws - wrong side **gauge** 13 sts and 8 row = 4 10 cm in double_crochet **measurements/sizes ** one size adjustable depth 34 inches 86 cm width 68 inches 172 cm when blocked **skill level ** easy/advanced beginner **the pattern on the blog ** the free version of this pattern supported by advertisements can be found on my blog at http //www brianakdesigns com/ 6 **let s be friends on social media ** website http //www brianakdesigns
